title: "Carrefour Trials Robot Delivery Service In Belgium"
excerpt: "The delivery robot trial will be in place until 15 August, with Carrefour hopeful that in time, it will be rolled out to other Belgian locations, including small and medium-sized towns where the retailer currently doesn't offer a existing home delivery service."
